name: Pornocrates: VHS

"Pornography is purely and simply a description of carnal pleasures; eroticism is the same revalued description, based on an idea of love or social life. Everything that is erotic is also necessarily pornographic" ~ Self-definition of Queen Pornocrates.



Playing is extremely easy because you can use your computer's keyboard and mouse or you can choose a joystick.
This is an easy-to-use first-person game: The player controls the character in a 3D environment filled with clues that can be read and objects that can be collected.
The game has features that allow you to watch VHS tapes and check CCTV cameras. These elements will be very important for the development of the game.
The game has several NPCs. There are armed enemies who will do anything to protect the VHS nightclub. They have mysterious interests that the user will need to discover.
During the game you can:
Collect items are hidden in the detective's office, the retro hacker's hideout, and the famous VHS nightclub.
Protect yourself using all sorts of weapons available (Glock, shotgun, axes).
Read messages and save them in inventory to review later.
There are two goals to achieve: Know what happened to the previous detective.
Finding out who the Pleasure Lady P*ssy is really Pornocrates and what's hidden behind her.
